Package l2_servers

This is a straightforward implementation of the cache L2, contains the classes and the utilities needed to provide the cache service.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheCleaner
    This class will act as a "garbage collector" for the cache; once reached a certain timeout or a certain load of the cache this class wakes up, keeps the lock of the cache and cleans all the videos outdated.
    CheckerL2
    Utility class to manage the request and response message according to the protocol
    ServerL2
    Server Cache class: it manages the requests of the proxies.
    UtilitiesL2
    UtilitiesL2 class: it contains few methods that are used frequently by the L2 servers.

Package l2_servers Description

This is a straightforward implementation of the cache L2, contains the classes and the utilities needed to provide the cache service.
